trans-unit.source: Manages the view state of the activity designer and its underlying model items.
Implements <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ViewStateService> and generates a text property that stores and retrieves its value from an associated controlâ€™s view state.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.WorkflowViewStateService"></xref> with a specified editing context.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> for the state service.
Retrieves the view state for a specified object.
The object whose view state is retrieved.
The <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2"></xref> that contains the view state.
The instance is `null`.
Removes the view state represented by the specified key and associated with the specified model item.
The workflow activity <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the current view state.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
`true` if the view state associated with the specified model item is found and removed; otherwise, `false`.
The modelItem or the key is `null`.
Retrieves the complete view state associated with a specified model item.
The workflow activity <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the current view state.
The <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2"></xref> that represents the view state.
The modelItem is `null`.
Retrieves the item that matches the specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
The workflow activity <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the current view state.
The key that identifies the view state item that is retrieved.
The item that matches the specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
The modelItem or the key is `null`.
Sets the view state on the parameter instance specified to the dictionary value that is specified.
An object that represents the view state.
The dictionary value to set.
The instance is `null`.
Stores the item represented by a specified key in the view state associated with a specified model item.
The workflow activity <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the current view state.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be stored.
The modelItem or the key is `null`.

Records the current setting of the item represented by the specified key so that it is available for an undo operation and then stores the item represented by the specified key in the view state of the specified model item.
The workflow activity <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with the current view state.
The <xref href="System.String"></xref> that identifies the view state item that is stored.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to be stored.
The modelItem or the key is `null`.
An event that signals that a change has been made to the undoable view state of the control.
An event that signals that a change has been made to the view state of the control.
Specifies the name of the state.
